comments.html: What best solution if you running DMVPN and one of your spoke are running on MTU lower then 1500, lowering MTU on spoke? Well this is only solution I see, but other spokes will suffer lower MTU too, thus less effective usage of bandwidth.
comments.name: Nikolay Shopik

comments.html:
Best solution? Don't run OSPF over DMVPN ;)

By definition, all hosts/routers connected to the same shared subnet must have the same MTU. Any workaround will eventually bite you.
